item.description:
MEETUP IS A GO! Leave the heat and storms behind, and stay inside at the movies! The Brattle has some seriously high-powered AC, so you might even need a light jacket.

Spend the whole day at the Brattle for back-to-back-to-back showings of Back to the Future 1-3.

It's like a marathon for the lazy as we spend the whole day inside watching the best time-traveling trilogy of films starring Michael J. Fox ever made. Instead of dying inside when the ominous words "To Be Continued" loom over you on the big screen, you will rejoice in the chance to refill your bucket of popcorn before the next Mr. Fusion-fueled installment.

Buy your ticket for the Triple Feature --->HERE<---
I'll be obnoxiously visible before the first movie, but please feel free to drop in at any point in the trilogy. Early exits are also permitted, but may be mocked. :)
item.name: Back to the Future Trilogy: A Day at the Brattle
